about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer & Digital Creative
about.tagline: Building digital solutions with modern technology and impactful design
about.description_1: I am a full-stack developer and web designer passionate about creating digital solutions that are not only visually appealing but also powerful in functionality. With experience working with various creative agencies and enterprise companies, I understand the importance of balancing aesthetics and performance.
about.description_2: My approach to every project is user-first and business-driven. I believe good design should solve real problems, and good code should be maintainable and scalable for long-term growth.
about.description_3: Currently, I focus on developing modern web applications using React, Next.js, and TypeScript, with special attention to performance optimization and user experience.
about.journey_description: A chronology of educational and professional experiences that have shaped me today.
about.projects_description: Wide range of projects from websites to complex applications
about.quality_description: Focus on delivering the best results
about.cta_description: Interested in developing your digital project? Let's discuss your ideas and needs, and I'll help turn them into powerful solutions.

education.university_description: Focus on web development, mobile development, and artificial intelligence.
education.junior_high_description: Proud to have studied at a leading school.

experience.freelance_description: Building modern websites and web applications, and other student tasks.
experience.internship_description: Intern as electro Support, computer system maintenance and troubleshooting.
experience.construction_description: Assisting heavy equipment operators (excavator, loader, bulldozer, crane, etc.) in daily activities.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Selected project collection showcasing expertise in web design and full-stack development.
portfolio.approach_description: I specialize in a diverse range of technologies, from TypeScript-driven frontends to Python-powered backends. Each project is an opportunity to solve unique challenges, whether it's building a responsive HTML site or architecting a complex PHP system. My focus is always on creating clean, efficient, and user-centric solutions that deliver real value.
portfolio.cta_description: Interested in seeing more detailed projects or discussing your project?

projects.toko_sepatu_desc: Modern e-commerce platform for shoes with integrated payment gateway and order tracking.
projects.company_profile_desc: Modern and interactive company profile website to enhance online business presence.
projects.coffe_shop_desc: Online coffee shop with ordering features and a product gallery to attract new customers.
projects.toko_grosir_desc: E-commerce platform for bulk purchases with competitive pricing and a streamlined checkout process.
projects.desa_wisata_desc: Interactive tourism website promoting the attractions of Tarutung Village to local and international visitors.
projects.portfolio_personal_desc: A personal portfolio website to showcase professional work and skills in an attractive and informative way.
projects.analisis_data_desc: A web application for performing data clustering and analysis using data mining algorithms.
projects.system_antrian_desc: A real-time queuing system for Bank MSK to efficiently manage customer service.
projects.resto_silaban_desc: A restaurant website with an interactive menu and online reservation system to enhance the customer experience.
projects.coffe_shop_clone_desc: A clone of the Ngopi.co.id website to demonstrate web scraping capabilities with Python.
projects.dashboard_resto_desc: A desktop application for managing a cafe and restaurant with inventory, sales, and financial reporting features.
projects.system_perpus_desc: An online library management system for cataloging books, managing loans, and tracking lending with high efficiency.
projects.topup_game_desc: An e-commerce platform for purchasing in-game items and currency with a fast and secure process.
projects.absensi_desktop_desc: A desktop application for digitally recording student attendance with reporting and attendance analytics features.
projects.keuangan_desc: A web application for managing personal finances with features for tracking expenses, budgeting, and financial reporting.
